CustomField.formula: IF(OneCRM__Related_Contact__c != null, OneCRM__Related_Contact__r.FirstName + " " + OneCRM__Related_Contact__r.LastName, OneCRM__RelatedAccount__r.Name) + " " + IF(ISPICKVAL(OneCRM__Status__c, "Current"), "is", "was") + " " + IF(OneCRM__Contact__c != null, OneCRM__Contact__r.FirstName + " " + OneCRM__Contact__r.LastName, OneCRM__Account__r.Name) + "'s " + IF( $Setup.OneCRM__Relationship_Settings__c.OneCRM__Reciprocal_Method__c = "Value Inversion" && CONTAINS(TEXT(OneCRM__Type__c), $Label.onecrm__Relationship_Split), RIGHT(TEXT(OneCRM__Type__c), LEN(TEXT(OneCRM__Type__c))-FIND($Label.onecrm__Relationship_Split,TEXT(OneCRM__Type__c))), TEXT(OneCRM__Type__c) )
CustomField.label: Relationship Explanation
